Service Details: - Offers brief counselling services for individuals experiencing pressing mental health concerns and psychosocial crisis and are struggling to cope- Services offered include further screening, stabilization and transition to other services- Ensures that individuals are seen in a timely manner and provided with a brief, completed service
How to Apply: Referrals can be made to BIS from Access, the Community Response Team, general practitioners and psychiatrists
Address & Map: Kelowna Central Health Centre505 Doyle AveKelowna, BC     V1Y 0C5
